explanations.reason: The paper focuses on the impact of corporate social responsibility (CSR) and ESG (environmental, social, governance) disclosure scores on the cost of debt in Scandinavian public companies. The methods used include fixed-effects regression models for balanced panel data sets, which are statistical methods rather than machine learning or deep learning techniques. None of the provided keywords related to machine learning, deep learning, or specific algorithms are mentioned or implied in the title or abstract.
